BIC:

<NEW>

As HY=
DRAS walked he could see the changes in the ship. Many fallen
ceilings and =
briken walls had been repaired. The security doors
recognized HYDRAS as he =
approached, chirped at him and then slid open.
The lights were dim in spots=
, evidently everything had not been done
yet, but all in all, much of the s=
hip seemed to be functional and had
power.

HYDRAS arrived at the main engi=
neering station where CYCLONUS had
positioned himself and had been working =
around clock without rest
since HYDRAS had commanded the ship to be made re=
ady.

The room itself looked well used and functional and in slightly bette=
r
shape then the rest of the ship, obviously this was the nerve center
of a=
ll the reapirs that had taken place. most of the screens seemed to
be worki=
ng, save for the ones that concerned engine control, and even
then things l=
ooked painted and ready.

There were several others in there with him, IGUA=
NUS, SCOURGE, FRACTYL
and TARANTULUS, all of whom looked slightly haggard, =
noting the
grueling amounts of work they had to keep up with.

CYCLONUS loo=
ked up at HYDRAS, somehow, despite the workload he managed
to look clean an=
d shined, not showing an ounce of fatigue as the rest
were showing.

=93Gre=
etings commander.=94 He said as he came around the console. =93I have
given=
 the command for the Predacons to gather in the main hanger bay.=94
As Hydr=
as probably knew, the hanger bay was one of the few rooms large
enough to h=
old them all at the same time. =93Deepstryke is assembling
them now.=94

CY=
CLONUS moved to escort HYDRAS, =93Do you have any further orders
before we =
go to the hanger?=94
